name: The House In The Woods
description:
Made for the Haunted PS1 Wretched Weekend #1 in around 48 hours

ENTER THE WOODS

On a camping trip into the forest your friend has vanished in the night.  As you step away from your camp to investigate you realise you are lost as well....


THE GAME

Heavily inspired by The Blair Witch Project.
Explore an endless forest and try to discover its secrets.

CONTROLS

Usual movement controls.
Hold shift or click the left stick down to run.
ALT+F4 to run away.
F11 for windowed, it's less scary in a window.
XBox pad support,

KNOWN ISSUES

Toggling the flashlight before being prompted can cause the prompt to remain on the screen forever.

The ending is, unfortunately, unfinished as we ran out of time for the jam.  

[UPDATED]

Fixed some audio bugs that should make navigating the woods a touch easier.

We may revisit this in the future...

MINIGOLIATH

Follow us on Twitter
